node-identifier: string
in path

ID of node-identifier

200 OK
XTC-IGP-INFO-TYPE

Successful operation

400 Bad Request

    "router-id": "string"
  },
  "ospf": {

    "area": "integer"

    "system-id": "string",

  }
}

Schema Definitions

XTC-IGP-INFO-TYPE:

XTC IGP INFO TYPE

bgp: XTC-IGP-INFO-BGP

BGP information

ospf: XTC-IGP-INFO-OSPF

OSPF information

igp-id: string isis, ospf, bgp

IGP ID

isis: XTC-IGP-INFO-ISIS

ISIS information

Example
{
  "bgp": {
    "router-id": "string"
  },
  "ospf": {
    "router-id": "string",
    "area": "integer"
  },
  "igp-id": "string",
  "isis": {
    "system-id": "string",
    "level": "integer"
  }
}

XTC-POLICY-BSID-BAG:

XTC policy binding SID information

explicit-based: boolean

Whether the binding SID is explicit-based

bsid-mode: string explicit, dynamic

Binding SID Mode

value: XTC-PREFIX-SID-TYPE

Binding SID value

state: string

State of the binding SID

policy-selected: boolean

Whether the policy is selected for forwarding on this BSID

error: string none, allocating, exists, internal, color-endpoint-exists, forwarding-rewrite-error, srlb-invalid-label

Binding SID error, if any

Example
{
  "explicit-based": "boolean",
  "bsid-mode": "string",
  "value": {
    "sid-type": "string",
    "ipv6": "string",
    "label": "integer"
  },
  "state": "string",
  "policy-selected": "boolean",
  "error": "string"
}

XTC-TOPO-SUMMARY-BAG:

XTC Topology Node Summary Information

prefixes: integer

Number of prefixes

adjacency-sids: integer

Number of adjacency SIDs

nodes: integer

Number of nodes

prefix-sids: integer

Number of prefix SIDs

links: integer

Number of links

Example
{
  "prefixes": "integer",
  "adjacency-sids": "integer",
  "nodes": "integer",
  "prefix-sids": "integer",
  "links": "integer"
}

XTC-IGP-INFO-OSPF:

XTC OSPF Information

router-id: string

OSPF router ID

area: integer

OSPF area

Example
{
  "router-id": "string",
  "area": "integer"
}

XTC-ON-DEMAND-COLOR-BAG:

On-Demand Color information

color-xr: integer

Color

disjoint-path-info: XTC-DIST-INFO-BAG

Disjoint path information

Example
{
  "color-xr": "integer",
  "disjoint-path-info": {
    "group-id": "integer",
    "sub-id": "integer",
    "disjointness-type": "string"
  }
}

XTC-CONTROLLER-POLICY-REQ-BAG:

Controller policy request

paths: XTC-POLICY-PATH-BAG

Path options

XTC-POLICY-PATH-BAG
creation-time: integer

Creation time of the request in seconds

binding-sid: integer

Binding SID

color-xr: integer

Color

last-updated-time: integer

Last updated time of the request in seconds

route-distinguisher-xr: integer

Route distinguisher

end-point: XTC-IP-ADDR-TYPE

End point

preference: integer

Preference

source-address-xr: string

Source address

Example
{
  "paths": [
    {
      "index": "integer",
      "metric-value": "integer",
      "name": "string",
      "weight": "integer",
      "is-valid": "boolean",
      "pce-address": "string",
      "sr-path-constraints": {
        "affinity-constraint": [
          {
            "color": [
              {
                "color": "string"
              }
            ],
            "type": "integer",
            "value": "integer"
          }
        ],
        "path-metrics": {
          "maximum-segments": "integer",
          "accumulative-igp-metric": "integer",
          "accumulative-te-metric": "integer",
          "margin-relative": "integer",
          "accumulative-delay": "integer",
          "margin-absolute": "integer"
        }
      },
      "metric-type": "integer",
      "pce-based-path": "boolean",
      "hops": [
        {
          "sid-type": "string",
          "remote-address": {
            "af-name": "string",
            "ipv4": "string",
            "ipv6": "string"
          },
          "local-address": {
            "af-name": "string",
            "ipv4": "string",
            "ipv6": "string"
          },
          "sid": {
            "sid-type": "string",
            "ipv6": "string",
            "label": "integer"
          }
        }
      ],
      "error": "string",
      "active": "boolean",
      "type": "string"
    }
  ],
  "creation-time": "integer",
  "binding-sid": "integer",
  "color-xr": "integer",
  "last-updated-time": "integer",
  "route-distinguisher-xr": "integer",
  "end-point": {
    "af-name": "string",
    "ipv4": "string",
    "ipv6": "string"
  },
  "preference": "integer",
  "source-address-xr": "string"
}

XTC-NODE-PID-BAG:

XTC Node Protocol Identifier Information

ipv4te-router-id: string

IPv4 BGP router ID

igp-information: XTC-IGP-INFO-BAG

IGP information

XTC-IGP-INFO-BAG
ipv4-bgp-router-id: string

IPv4 TE router ID

ipv4te-router-id-set: boolean

True if IPv4 TE router ID is set

ipv4-bgp-router-id-set: boolean

True if IPv4 BGP router ID is set

node-name: string

Node Name

Example
{
  "ipv4te-router-id": "string",
  "igp-information": [
    {
      "domain-identifier": "integer",
      "igp": {
        "bgp": {
          "router-id": "string"
        },
        "ospf": {
          "router-id": "string",
          "area": "integer"
        },
        "igp-id": "string",
        "isis": {
          "system-id": "string",
          "level": "integer"
        }
      }
    }
  ],
  "ipv4-bgp-router-id": "string",
  "ipv4te-router-id-set": "boolean",
  "ipv4-bgp-router-id-set": "boolean",
  "node-name": "string"
}

XTC-POLICY-BAG:

XTC policy information

paths: XTC-POLICY-PATH-BAG

Path options

XTC-POLICY-PATH-BAG
forward-class: integer

Forward class of the policy

policy-group-identifier: integer

Policy group identifier

down-time: integer

Policy down time in nano seconds

color: integer

Color

policy-name: string

Policy name

local-label-identifier: integer

Local label identifier

binding-sid: XTC-POLICY-BSID-BAG

Binding SID information

administrative-up: integer

Admin up

interface-handle: integer

Interface handle

up-age: integer

Policy up age (since) in nano seconds

auto-policy-info: XTC-POLICY-AUTO-BAG

Autopolicy information

local-label: integer

Local label

destination-address: XTC-IP-ADDR-TYPE

Destination address

is-auto-policy: boolean

Whether policy was automatically created or configured

up-time: integer

Policy up time in nano seconds

transition-count: integer

Indicates number of up/down transitions

operational-up: integer

Operational up

down-age: integer

Policy down age (since) in nano seconds

lsp-id: integer

LSP ID
